  • Constructor Details

    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView​(int id, PlayerAction p, Connection connection, java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> opponents)
      Instantiates a VirtualView Object for each player in a match.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the VirtualView.
      p - the PlayerAction object containing player's credentials.
      connection - the Connection the player is using.
      opponents - Vector containing all opponent's name.

  • Method Details

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction​(PlayerAction action)
      Notifies the observers with a message containing player's action.
      Parameters:
      action - the player's action.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(GameMessage message)
      Sends via socket a GameMessage object.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be sent.

    • update

      public void update​(GameMessage message)
      Called whenever the observed object is changed. Sends the passed GameMessage if its virtualViewID is null or if it's the same as this VirtualView.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<GameMessage>
      Parameters:
      message - an argument passed to the notify method.

    • getId

      public int getId()
